channel.title: Comments on: Best Practice: Do not cluster on UniqueIdentifier when you use NewId
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Qaiser Mehmood
item.dc:creator: Qaiser Mehmood
item.description: Thanks for sharing this great information. At least, I have learned the difference between NewID() and NewSequentialId().
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing this great information. At least, I have learned the difference between NewID() and NewSequentialId().

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: Very informative. I never would have known about this, although I rarely use uids.
item.content:encoded: Very informative. I never would have known about this, although I rarely use uids.
